page.title: 04LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: IN THE VILLAGE HALL THERE IS BADMINTON, INDOOR BOWLING, A FIVE-HUNDRED CLUB AND THE SENIOR CITIZENS CLUB. (THE FIVE-HUNDRED CLUB IS A FUND-RAISING ORGANISATION - IN AID OF THE VILLAGE HALL.) THERE IS A S.W.R.I. AND THE CHURCH WOMEN'S GUILD. THE VILLAGE CHRISTMAS PARTY IS ALSO HELD HERE. MOST EVENING CLASSES ARE HELD AT DUNS, 14 KM AWAY. LOCALS GO TO SWIMMING, FLORAL ART AND STICK DRESSING. THEY CAN ALSO GO WATER SKI-ING AT THE CHAIN BRIDGE ON THE TWEED, AND GO FISHING, HORSE-RIDING AND PLAYING FOOTBALL AT CHIRNSIDE OR SWINTON. MOST OF THE LEISURE ACTIVITIES INVOLVE TRAVELLING FOR THE VILLAGERS.
